Package app

Class Photo

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.Photo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Photo>
    public class Photo
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Photo>
    Class that is intended to store information about a photo that the user gives to Photos.
    Author:
    Eshan Wadhwa and Vishal Patel
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.lang.String caption
      User made caption for the photo.
      private java.lang.String location
      Stores the address of the photo on the user's machine.
      private java.time.LocalDateTime photoDate
      Date for the "last modified" attribute of the photo file on the user's system in ISO-8601.
      private java.util.List<Tag> photoTags
      Each photo has a list of tags that the user can refer to in order to find this photo.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Photo​(java.lang.String caption, java.io.File found)
      Constructor to create an instance that stores our info for a specific photo.

    • Field Detail

      • location

        private java.lang.String location
        Stores the address of the photo on the user's machine. Intention is to then refer to the photo and display it via URL.

      • caption

        private java.lang.String caption
        User made caption for the photo.

      • photoDate

        private java.time.LocalDateTime photoDate
        Date for the "last modified" attribute of the photo file on the user's system in ISO-8601. Has date and time which considers the user's timezone.

      • photoTags

        private java.util.List<Tag> photoTags
        Each photo has a list of tags that the user can refer to in order to find this photo.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Photo

        public Photo​(java.lang.String caption,
             java.io.File found)
        Constructor to create an instance that stores our info for a specific photo.
        Parameters:
        caption - This is the string that the user wants to caption the photo with.
        found - This is the photo file that is passed by our java controller, which checks if this file exists before passing it here. So, this file is guaranteed to exist and it is a photo file.

    • Method Detail

      • addTag

        public boolean addTag​(java.lang.String name,
                      boolean multipleValues)
        Adds a tag to the list of tags associated with this photo.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the tag to add.
        multipleValues - Boolean representing if the tag is allowed to have multiple values or not.
        Returns:
        returns true if the tag was successfully added. False otherwise.

      • removeTag

        public boolean removeTag​(java.lang.String tagName)
        Method to remove an entire tag from our photo.
        Parameters:
        tagName - This is the name of the tag we wish to remove.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the tag was successfully deleted. False otherwise.

      • addValue

        public boolean addValue​(java.lang.String tagName,
                        java.lang.String value)
        Method to add a value to a certain tag for a Photo.
        Parameters:
        tagName - Tag we wish to add our value to.
        value - Value to add.
        Returns:
        Returns true if value successfully added. False otherwise.

      • removeValue

        public boolean removeValue​(java.lang.String tagName,
                           java.lang.String value)
        Method to remove a value from a certain tag in our Photo. If there are no values in our tag after removal, then we delete the tag.
        Parameters:
        tagName - Name of the tag we wish to remove a value from
        value - Value to remove.
        Returns:
        Returns true if value was successfully removed. False otherwise.

      • tagIterator

        public java.util.Iterator<Tag> tagIterator()
        Gets iterator for tags associated with this photo.
        Returns:
        Returns an iterator that can iterate through the tags of this photo.

      • equals

        public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object o)
        Overriding Object equals to provide equals functionality for Photos. Two Photos are equal if they have the same location on the user's machine, regardless of caption.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo​(Photo other)
        CompareTo implementation to compare two photos based on their localDateTime
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Photo>

      • getLocation

        public java.lang.String getLocation()
        Getter for photo location on machine.
        Returns:
        String that represents the URL Path where the photo is stored on the machine.

      • setLocation

        public void setLocation​(java.lang.String location)
        Setter for photo location on machine
        Parameters:
        location - This is the photo path to be set for this photo.

      • getCaption

        public java.lang.String getCaption()
        Getter for the caption of a photo.
        Returns:
        Returns a string, which represents the caption of the photo.

      • setCaption

        public void setCaption​(java.lang.String caption)
        Setter for the caption of a photo.
        Parameters:
        caption - This is the caption to set for the photo.

      • getPhotoDate

        public java.time.LocalDateTime getPhotoDate()
        Getter for the date and time of the photo.
        Returns:
        Returns the LocalDateTime instance that represents the date and time of the photo, based on the machines timezone.

      • setPhotoDate

        public void setPhotoDate​(java.time.LocalDateTime photoDate)
        Setter for the date and time of the photo.
        Parameters:
        photoDate - The localDateTime instance to be set for the Photo.

      • getPhotoTags

        public java.util.List<Tag> getPhotoTags()
        Getter for the list of tags of a photo.
        Returns:
        Returns a list, which represents the list of tags associated with the photo.

      • setPhotoTags

        public void setPhotoTags​(java.util.List<Tag> photoTags)
        Setter for the list of tags for the photo.
        Parameters:
        photoTags - This is the list of tags to be set for the photo.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        String conversion of a Photo into the date it was taken (i.e Mon-Day-Year)
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • getTag

        public Tag getTag​(java.lang.String tag)
        Helper method to get a Tag, if it exists, given its string name.
        Parameters:
        tag - String of the tag we wish to get.
        Returns:
        Returns the tag, if found. Otherwise, returns null.
